statements: DELETE FROM pedestrian_cyclist_safety WHERE id = 1 AND incident_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM pedestrian_cyclist_safety WHERE safety_rating > 3 AND incident_type = 'Accident';
DELETE FROM cyclist_safety WHERE incident_type = 'Hit and Run';
DELETE FROM pedestrian_safety WHERE id = 1 AND incident_date = '2021-10-15'
DELETE FROM PedestrianSafety WHERE ID = 1 AND IncidentType = 'Accident';
DELETE FROM cyclist_injuries WHERE type = 'Fracture' AND location = 'Downtown';
DELETE FROM CyclistAccidents WHERE location = 'Main Street' AND accident_date = '2022-05-15';
DELETE FROM PedestrianAccidents WHERE location = 'Downtown' AND accident_date = '2021-10-15';
DELETE FROM CyclistAccidents WHERE accident_type = 'Collision' AND injured_cyclist = 'John Doe';
